Credits:

This game was made by three French developers for the #GMTKJam 
Theme : Only One

Project manager & Art : Quenth
Game & Sound Design : Allifeur
Programmer : Becher

The Game :

"Light Them Up is an unique Beat-em-up taking place in a darkened world. Machines took over the towns; you are all by yourself now, bearing a single beam of light to defend yourself. Use it wisely to light your enemies and destroy them before they do, it won't last long."

Don't hesitate to share you highest score. Controls :
